title: Late-night thoughts currently giving me a massive panic attack
body:
So now I can't sleep. GD, what field would I have to go into to research immortality? Biogenetics? Biochemistry? I need to know so I can dedicate my life to searching for immortality. If I die peacefully, it will be in the middle of research. Otherwise I'll die in a panic.

{{champion:23}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:105}}
